Character.name: Elara
Character.backstory: Elara grew up in a secluded village where she learned the ancient arts of witchcraft from her grandmother. After a dark prophecy foretold of a great evil, she set out to gather allies and prevent the impending doom.

Location.name: The Enchanted Forest
Location.description: A mystical forest filled with ancient trees, glowing plants, and hidden creatures. The air is thick with magic, and the paths shift to confuse intruders.
